name: Squid Game: The Game
description:
Squid Game: The Game is a survival horror game based on the popular Netflix thriller ‘Squid Game’. Compete among a crowd in a number of games direct from the show to see if you have what it takes to survive.

You meet a man in the subway offering vast riches and exorbitant amounts of money. All you have to do is play a few simple games. Sounds like child's play... right?

Watch Dev Logs, Game Design/ Programming Tutorials and More on my YouTube

CONTROLS

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WASD- MOVEMENT

SPACE- ROLL

Q- CELEBRATE

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TUG OF WAR Update Coming Soon
